metadata.name: The Toms #1
metadata.description: The Toms NFT Collection comes from Thomas Verdi's short dark comedy film, "The Toms," where, in a world run by Toms, a man named Tim tries to infiltrate their secret society because he feels that his name is close enough. This collection features 999 unique Toms and 1 completely unique Timâ€”the outsider. The Toms are over-the-top, grandiose, and they think they're the epitome of relaxed cool. The film explores themes of isolation and the lengths people will go to in order to be accepted. You can learn more about the film's release at thetomsfilm.com.
